The image was published on Facebook on A: 2020, with a caption mentioning the display of Hindu God on Times Square billboards.
Times Square is a well: known commercial intersection and tourist destination in Manhattan, New York City.
The claim uses the Hindi expression: Jai Shree Ram," which translates to victory to Hindu Lord Rama.
Various sources and comparisons: including a reverse image search and a Google search for Times Square billboard generator, indicate that the image is misleading and has been manipulated.
